page.title: 07Trimpley Village Hall
page.content: Trimpley Village Hall is a most important amenity in an area without a school or shop where people may meet and get to know their neighbours.Local support has been shown by the raising of Â£36,000 in the past 3 years for the improvement of fabric and facilities, some as grants from local councils but most from monthly fund-raising events such as dances,meals,raffles,quizzes, sponsored events and barBQs. It is used regularly by the Parish Council, Women's Institute, Keep Fit, and the Men's Club which rents one of the two large rooms permanently and has a separate Management Committee. The attractive brick building which can seat 70 can be hired for wedding receptions etc.,and is used on most weekends in the Summer.
